name: Students of the Abyss: Persie's Predicament
name_original: Students of the Abyss: Persie's Predicament
description:
An interactive story about a witch and their annoying housemate.

Persie is tired. 

All they want to do is finish up their marking and go to bed.

Enter Darren - their oblivious, talkative housemate, eager to learn more about Persie at the tender hour of 5am.

It doesn't look like Persie will get to sleep anytime soon.
